ISSUE.TITLE: Adapt AsynHistoryManager to use the new runtime ActivityInstance
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When the runtime `ActivityInstance` were added there were new methods added to the `HistoryManager`. The current implementation of `recordActivityEnd(ActivityInstance activityInstance)` uses the old `getActivityStart` to get the activity start based on the execution and activityId. We should add a new method that would get the activity start based on the runtime activity instance id
